sn1.4:4.2: Standing to one side, that deity recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.4:5.2: the stages of life leave us one by one.
sn1.4:5.4: you should do good deeds that bring happiness.”
sn1.4:6.2: the stages of life leave us one by one.
sn1.4:6.4: one looking for peace would drop the world’s bait.”
